about_the_game:
Ascend to become the best apocalypse lord on the universe!

Features :
• 3 Supernatural beings with different skills to cause an apocalypse.

• Upgrade your being, acquire new skills for him, and make it increasingly more powerful.

• In addition to their own skills, there are global skills that work independently of your being.

• Unlock amulets from other beings to combine their skills with your chosen one.

• Thousand of enemies to fight against, they never stop coming!

• Transform defeated enemies into minions so they join the fight on your side.

• Online leaderboards to compete with other players. Can you be the best?

name: Apocalypse Lords

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Apocalypse Begins! Select a supernatural being and plunge the world into chaos. Defeat countless enemies, turn them into minions, destroy everything in your path and upgrade your creature with many different skills. Ascend to become ultimate Apocalypse Lord!
